title: @*+*@ 1100 SQ.FT... 2BE/2 bathroom APARTMENT FOR RENT $825!!+++
posting_body: ['EMERALD SPRINGS APARTMENTS ARE BRAND NEW 2, 3, AND 4 BEDROOM TOWNHOMES for rent in Detroit.', 'Our APARTMENT homes and townhomes are up to 1,400 sq. ft.!', 'The APARTMENT community features a beautiful clubhouse with a fitness and business center, as well as a complete media room with a projection screen, recliners, games, and more!', 'We have a recreational area including several play structures, bar-b-que grills, picnic tables, and a neighborhood feels.', 'Each apartment will feature a washer/dryer, fully equipped kitchens including microwaves and dishwashers, private entrances, and open floor plans.', 'We are located on the corner of MOUND Rd. and Charles St. From M-8/Davison Freeway head east.', 'Turn right on Conant St, and left on Charles St.', 'We are located near M-8/Davison Freeway, M-10/Lodge, I-75, I-96, Downtown Detroit, the Detroit Casinos, Sports venues, shopping, restaurants, and more!WELCOME SECTION 08.*All', 'RENTAL ASSISTANCE PROGRAMS ACCEPTED.THANKS!!', '☎', 'WE ARE OPEN and would love to show you around, please call to schedule your tour!@', 'show contact info', '!!']
